about_the_game:
Prepare for an Elemental Battle like no other in Elemental Defenders - the groundbreaking Tower Defense game where the towers are on the move! Unlike traditional TD games, here, the action revolves around dynamic Elemental Towers that roam the battlefield.

🌍 Immerse Yourself: Engage with 8 immersive maps and conquer 32 pulse-pounding levels. With over 200 unique towers at your command, the possibilities are endless!

🔥 Master the Elements: Battle against a horde of 21 relentless enemies across 3 challenging difficulties. Adapt and strategize to crush every wave that comes your way.

⚙️ Unleash Deep Strategies: Brace yourself for an initial learning curve as you acquaint yourself with the vast arsenal of towers. Once you've got the hang of a few, dive into a world of deep and intricate strategies that'll elevate your gameplay.

🌟 Progressively Challenging: Ease into the action as you navigate through manageable levels, allowing you to grasp the fundamentals of tower synergy. But don't be deceived – to conquer the ultimate Insane difficulty, you'll need a rock-solid strategy.

🔬 The Tower Lab: Test and refine your tower combinations in The Lab, where experimentation is key. Can you concoct the perfect blend to triumph over the Insane challenge?

🌀 Endless Survival: Put your skills to the ultimate test in Endless mode. How long can you hold out against the relentless onslaught? The leaderboard beckons!

Get ready to rewrite the rules of Tower Defense with Elemental Defenders. Download now and experience a dynamic, strategy-rich gaming adventure like never before!
detailed_description:
Prepare for an Elemental Battle like no other in Elemental Defenders - the groundbreaking Tower Defense game where the towers are on the move! Unlike traditional TD games, here, the action revolves around dynamic Elemental Towers that roam the battlefield.

🌍 Immerse Yourself: Engage with 8 immersive maps and conquer 32 pulse-pounding levels. With over 200 unique towers at your command, the possibilities are endless!

🔥 Master the Elements: Battle against a horde of 21 relentless enemies across 3 challenging difficulties. Adapt and strategize to crush every wave that comes your way.

⚙️ Unleash Deep Strategies: Brace yourself for an initial learning curve as you acquaint yourself with the vast arsenal of towers. Once you've got the hang of a few, dive into a world of deep and intricate strategies that'll elevate your gameplay.

🌟 Progressively Challenging: Ease into the action as you navigate through manageable levels, allowing you to grasp the fundamentals of tower synergy. But don't be deceived – to conquer the ultimate Insane difficulty, you'll need a rock-solid strategy.

🔬 The Tower Lab: Test and refine your tower combinations in The Lab, where experimentation is key. Can you concoct the perfect blend to triumph over the Insane challenge?

🌀 Endless Survival: Put your skills to the ultimate test in Endless mode. How long can you hold out against the relentless onslaught? The leaderboard beckons!

Get ready to rewrite the rules of Tower Defense with Elemental Defenders. Download now and experience a dynamic, strategy-rich gaming adventure like never before!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14.6
  • Processor: 1,6 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

name: Elemental Defenders TD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: A Tower Defense where the Towers are moving around the enemies. With over 200 towers and endless mode. There is almost infinite strategies.
